exceptions.exn: In environment T : cpo s1, s2 : Pred T Hs1 : [Pred s | bot \\In s /\\ (forall d : chain T, d <=p s -> lim d \\In s)] s1 Hs2 : [Pred s | bot \\In s /\\ (forall d : chain T, d <=p s -> lim d \\In s)] s2 d : chain T Hd : d <=p PredI s1 s2 Unable to unify "[Pred s | bot \\In s /\\ (forall d : chain T, d <=p s -> lim d \\In s)] s1" with "lim d \\In d".
The reference Hx was not found in the current environment.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

In environment T : cpo s1, s2 : Pred T Hs1 : [Pred s | bot \\In s /\\ (forall d : chain T, d <=p s -> lim d \\In s)] s1 Hs2 : [Pred s | bot \\In s /\\ (forall d : chain T, d <=p s -> lim d \\In s)] s2 d : chain T Hd : d <=p PredI s1 s2 Unable to unify "[Pred s | bot \\In s /\\ (forall d : chain T, d <=p s -> lim d \\In s)] s2" with "lim d \\In d".
The reference Hx was not found in the current environment.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

original: intros Hs1 Hs2. unfold chain_closed in *. split. - split; [apply Hs1 | apply Hs2]. - intros d Hd. split; apply Hd. + apply Hs1. intros x Hx. apply Hx. destruct Hd. auto. + apply Hs2. intros x Hx. apply Hx. destruct Hd. auto.
